message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm happy to offer it for $1,800,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. Considering the value I place on the product, I am willing to pay up to $1,500,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,700,000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the reduction, I still believe the product is worth less than $1,600,000 to me. I would like to propose a price of $1,550,000.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $1,625,000? This demonstrates my commitment to finding a fair deal.
Alice, thank you for your continued flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $1,600,000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable solution.
